name: Azure
description: Cloud platform I use for hosting web apps, managing infrastructure, and integrating DevOps workflows.

name: Azure DevOps
description: Used for continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD), version control, and agile project management.

name: Babylon.js
description: A powerful WebGL-based 3D engine I use to build immersive VR and WebXR experiences directly in the browser.

name: HTML
description: The backbone of all web applications; I use HTML to structure content and ensure semantic, accessible markup.

name: CSS
description: Used to style web applications with responsiveness, layout control, and animations.

name: SASS (SCSS)
description: A CSS preprocessor that helps me write cleaner, modular, and more maintainable stylesheets.

name: React Bootstrap
description: A component library I use to quickly build consistent and responsive UIs with Bootstrap styling in React.

name: JavaScript
description: My primary language for adding interactivity and logic to client-side applications.

name: TypeScript
description: Strongly typed superset of JavaScript that helps me write safer, more robust, and scalable code.

name: MySQL
description: A relational database I use for structured data storage and server-side data queries.

name: MongoDB
description: A NoSQL database I use for handling flexible, document-based data—ideal for dynamic applications and quick iterations.

name: Python
description: A versatile language I use for scripting, server-side logic, and backend services.

name: React.js
description: The core of my frontend development—building fast, component-driven interfaces.

name: Vite
description: A modern build tool I use with React for fast development and optimized production builds.

name: Colyseus
description: A multiplayer server framework I use to build synchronized, real-time multi-user VR experiences.

name: VS Code
description: My go-to code editor, equipped with extensions and tooling that streamline my development workflow.

name: React Redux
description: A predictable state management library I use to manage and share state across components in large applications.

name: React Router
description: Handles client-side routing in my single-page applications for seamless page transitions and route control.

name: ChatGPT
description: An AI assistant I use for brainstorming, debugging, writing, and accelerating development tasks across the stack.

name: Gemini
description: Google’s AI tool I use for code generation, content ideation, and enhancing productivity in both frontend and backend workflows.
